TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DeviceFontSubstitution extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定是否在印表機上啟用裝置字型替換。

span.span: Specifies whether device font substitution is enabled on a printer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 僅限文字，非字型，傳送至印表機時，更快速列印。Printing is faster when only the text, not the font, is sent to the printer. 部分印表機具有永久儲存在其記憶體中的字型。Some printers have fonts that are permanently stored in their memory. 這些印表機讓使用者列印的應用程式由每個字型常駐印表機字型替代。These printers enable users to substitute a resident printer font for each font that is used by the printing application. 此型別的值主要用於下列用途：The values of this type are used primarily for these purposes: - 為成員集合、 屬性，它們代表的印表機功能。As members of the collection, a property of , they represent the printer capabilities. - 值為屬性，這些指示啟用或停用裝置字型替換列印工作的印表機。As the value of the property of a , they instruct the printer to enable or disable device font substitution for the print job. 未知的值永遠不會用於屬性物件。The Unknown value is never used in properties of objects. 您應該永遠不會設定為未知的屬性。You should never set a property to Unknown. 如果其他產生應用程式已建立裝置字型替換功能將無法辨識的選項 PrintTicket 文件 (也就是未定義中的選項[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397))，然後該文件，建構應用程式中的物件都有未知的值為屬性。If some other producing application has created a PrintTicket document that sets the device font substitution feature to an unrecognized option (that is, an option that is not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)), then a object in your application that is constructed with that document will have Unknown as the value of the property. 雖然和類別無法被繼承，您可以擴充[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)辨識不計算中的列印裝置功能或類別。Although the and classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the or classes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NOTINBUILD： 如何： 列印結構描述和建立新的列印系統類別擴充](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885)。For more information, see [NOTINBUILD: How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885). ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何判斷印表機功能，以及設定列印工作，以充分利用它們。The following example shows how to determine printer capabilities and configure the print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.DeviceFontSubstitution Off = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.DeviceFontSubstitution On = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.DeviceFontSubstitution Unknown = int32(0)

summary.span: 功能 (其選項由這個列舉表示) 設定的選項並未在[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)中定義。

span.span: The feature (whose options are represented by this enumeration) is set to an option not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).
